title: Every NTH Element
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of higher-order functions in JavaScript. We will learn how to use built-in higher-order functions such as map(), filter(), and reduce() to manipulate and transform arrays. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid understanding of higher-order functions and be able to apply them in your own JavaScript projects.

meta.title: JavaScript Higher-Order Functions | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Explore the concept of higher-order functions in JavaScript, learn to use built-in methods like map(), filter(), and reduce() to manipulate arrays.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, Higher-Order Functions, Map, Filter, Reduce, Programming Tutorials

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Bash History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
